statements: SELECT * FROM song_records;
SELECT song_title, artist_name FROM song_records WHERE song_id = '1';
SELECT artist_name, song_title FROM song_records WHERE artist_name = 'Adele';
SELECT * FROM song_records ORDER BY song_title ASC;
SELECT song_title, artist_name, lyrics FROM song_records WHERE song_title LIKE '%Love%';
SELECT * FROM song_records
SELECT song_title, artist_name FROM song_records WHERE artist_name = 'Taylor Swift'
SELECT song_title, artist_name FROM song_records WHERE artist_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY song_title DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT song_title, artist_name FROM song_records WHERE artist_name IN ('Ed Sheeran', 'Adele', 'Beyonce')
SELECT song_title, artist_name FROM song_records WHERE song_title ILIKE '%love%'
SELECT * FROM Songs WHERE artist='Taylor Swift';
SELECT id, title FROM Songs ORDER BY title DESC;
SELECT lyrics FROM Songs WHERE title LIKE '%love%';
SELECT artist, COUNT(*) as song_count FROM Songs GROUP BY artist;
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE email='test@example.com';
SELECT id, title, artist FROM Songs WHERE id = 1;
SELECT artist, title, lyrics FROM Songs WHERE artist = 'Ed Sheeran';
SELECT * FROM Songs ORDER BY artist ASC;
SELECT title, artist, lyrics FROM Songs WHERE title LIKE '%love%';
SELECT id, title, artist, music_score FROM Songs WHERE id > 5 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM songs;
SELECT song_name, artist_name FROM songs WHERE artist_name = 'Adele';
SELECT * FROM albums ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT album_name, COUNT(song_id) AS total_songs FROM albums LEFT JOIN song_owners ON albums.album_id = song_owners.album_id GROUP BY album_name;
SELECT song_name, COUNT(owner_id) AS total_owners FROM songs INNER JOIN song_owners ON songs.song_id = song_owners.song_id GROUP BY song_name ORDER BY total_owners DESC;
SELECT * FROM songs ORDER BY song_name DESC;
SELECT song_name, artist_name, lyrics FROM songs WHERE artist_name = 'Adele';
SELECT album_name, genre, release_date FROM albums WHERE genre = 'Pop' ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT song_name, artist_name, ownership_start_date, ownership_end_date FROM songs JOIN song_owners ON songs.song_id = song_owners.song_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_songs, AVG(song_id) AS avg_song_id FROM songs;
SELECT * FROM Songs;
SELECT song_title, artist_name FROM Songs WHERE artist_name = 'Adele';
SELECT song_title, artist_name, score_id FROM Songs WHERE score_id > 1000 ORDER BY artist_name DESC;
SELECT song_title, artist_name, lyricist_name FROM Songs WHERE song_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY song_title;
SELECT * FROM Artists WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM Songs;
SELECT song_id, song_title, artist_name FROM Songs WHERE artist_name = 'Ariana Grande';
SELECT song_title, artist_name FROM Songs WHERE artist_name = 'Justin Bieber' AND score_id > 1000;
SELECT artist_name, COUNT(song_id) AS song_count FROM Songs GROUP BY artist_name;
SELECT lyric_id, song_id, verse_number, lyrics_text FROM Lyrics ORDER BY verse_number DESC;
SELECT * FROM Song;
SELECT title, artist FROM Song WHERE genre = 'Pop';
SELECT song_id, title, artist FROM Song ORDER BY artist ASC;
SELECT writer_name, title FROM SongWriter INNER JOIN Song ON SongWriter.song_id = Song.song_id;
SELECT record_id, practice_date, duration FROM PracticeRecord WHERE song_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Song WHERE genre = 'Pop' ORDER BY title DESC;
SELECT artist, COUNT(*) AS song_count FROM Song GROUP BY artist HAVING COUNT(*) >= 3;
SELECT Song.title, Lyric.lyric_text FROM Song INNER JOIN Lyric ON Song.song_id = Lyric.song_id WHERE language = 'English';
SELECT Song.title, MusicScore.instrument FROM Song LEFT JOIN MusicScore ON Song.song_id = MusicScore.song_id WHERE instrument = 'Guitar';
SELECT Song.title, SongWriter.writer_name FROM Song INNER JOIN SongWriter ON Song.song_id = SongWriter.song_id ORDER BY Song.title ASC, SongWriter.writer_name ASC;
